reset_password.title: Senisim Paswod Bilong Yu
reset_password.success_message: Yu senisim paswod gut! Yu inap klosim dispela windo na login long app nau.

validation.required: Mas gat wanpela leta o namba

error_message.same_password: Nupela paswod i no ken wankain olsem olpela paswod.
error_message.otp_expired: Email link i no stret o em i pinis taim.

reset_password.redirecting: Wok long go long LangQuest app...

registration_confirmation.title: Raistrais Bilong LangQuest
registration_confirmation.processing: Wok long stretim raistrais bilong yu...
registration_confirmation.success_message: Mipela i kamapim klia raistrais bilong yu! Yu inap login long LangQuest app nau.

download_section.message: Daunlodim LangQuest app na statim wok long tokples bilong yu:

subscribe_form.success: Yu bin makim nem gut pinis!

errors.tryAgain: Makim nem i pundaun. Traim gen plis.

hero.title: Trenslet, Lukautim, na Konektim
hero.subtitle: Trenslet na lukautim tokples bilong dai nating long olgeta hap, maski nogat intanet.

features.title: Mekim Gut Long Wok Trenslet Long Ples We i Tambu
features.subtitle: LangQuest i helpim wok trenslet long ol hevi ples tu.

offline.title: Wok Maski Nogat Intanet
offline.description: Yu inap wok longtaim maski intanet i no stap. Data bilong yu i stap seif long insait long devaes inap yu inap long sinkim.

ai.title: AI i Helpim Trenslet
ai.description: Yusim AI long kamapim nambawan tok, na ol yusa i ken lukim na vot long en, na wok i go hariap.

gamification.title: Ple-Stail (Gamification)
gamification.description: Ol samting olsem lis bilong ol i go antap na ol prais i mekim wok i amamas na i kirapim ol manmeri long join.

openData.title: Opendata
openData.description: Ol trenslet we ol man i bin makim klia bai i go insait long wanpela opelaisens databes na bai i helpim trenim ol AI model bihain.

howItWorks.title: Ol Rot Bilong Wok Bilong LangQuest
howItWorks.subtitle: Ranim ol trenslet long ol projek, kwes, na aset bilong ranim isi.

projects.title: Wokim Ol Projek
projects.description: Ranim wok trenslet bilong yu insait long ol projek, olsem trensletim Baibel o ol bikpela skripsa bilong kastom.

collaborate.title: Wok Wantaim
collaborate.description: Singautim ol memba bilong komyuniti long givim ol trenslet na vot long wok bilong narapela.

validate.title: Makim Klia & Salim
validate.description: Makim klia ol trenslet long rot bilong vot na salim i go long olgeta manmeri.

useCases.title: Gutpela Long
useCases.subtitle: LangQuest i stret long kain kain nid bilong trenslet.

future.title: Bihain: Koneksen Namel Long Ol Devaes
future.subtitle: Mipela i wok long painim rot bilong mekim ol devaes i ken serim data stret wantaim nating intanet.

features.share: Serim ol nius namel long ol devaes taim ol memba i bung
features.sync: Sinkronaisim wok namel long planti devaes nating intanet
features.collaborate: Mekim tru tru wok wantaim long ples i stap longwe

cta.title: Joinim Kmuniti Bilong LangQuest
cta.subtitle: Yu ken kam pastaim na helpim lukautim ol tokples we i sot long sapot.
cta.notification: Mipela bai tokim yu taim LangQuest i redi long beta test.
